sect1.title: Where Will I Find $LANGUAGE Developers to Maintain It?

listitem.para: This question immediately assumes that it is already possible to find developers who "know $MORE_FAMILIAR_LANGUAGE" easier.
An enormous majority of programmers know very little about the programming language with which they work.

This implies that knowledge of the programming language is vastly over-estimated in its importance to productivity, since developers are already productive with an extremely poor understanding of their programming language.
...to such an extent that we should dismiss it.
...and parody it by observing its arbitrariness. "Where will I ever find a developer who is familiar with leaving line 68 blank!?"
